opensoul.org

Raise the roof, yo!

December 6, 2010 ruby, tidbit

Check out this awesome abuse of Ruby syntax from Don Petersen:

module Kernel
  def the(a, b)
    a.new(b)
  end

  def roof
    Exception
  end

  def yo!
    "Get your hands in the air, wave them like..."
  end
end

raise the roof, yo!
# Exception: Get your hands in the air, wave them like...
